price: Həqiqətən, bunda (dərk edən) qəlbi olan, hazır durub (diqqətlə) qulaq asan kimsə üçün öyüd-nəsihət var.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلۡبٌ أَوۡ أَلۡقَى ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٞ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika ladhik'rā liman kāna lahu qalbun aw alqā al-samʿa wahuwa shahīdun
